Name: Long Flight of Stairs
Ingredients: 30 ml Calvados / apple brandy / straight applejack
30 ml Belle de Brillet pear liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of apple or pear slice.
Review: A seriously tasty, strong, long drink. The name is a reversal of the London rhyming slang 'apples and pears' (stairs).
History: Created in 2005 by yours truly in homage to the G.E. Club's Stairs cocktail .
Nutrition: One serving of Long Flight of Stairs contains 199 calories
